content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to create some macrame plant hangers to complement your upcycled home decor items. Using sturdy knots and hooks, and choosing planters that are proportional to the size of the macrame hanger and the plant, will ensure that your pieces are both functional and visually appealing.

Ceramic or terracotta planters are an excellent choice to pair with macrame hangers, as they add a natural, earthy touch to the overall design. And, by adding a stabilizer, you'll prevent the planter from swinging or tilting, which will keep the plant safe and secure.

Remember to have fun and be creative with your macrame plant hangers! Experiment with different knots, cord colors, and planter styles to create unique pieces that reflect your personal style. And, don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Good luck with your project, and I hope you have a fantastic time at the Artisan's Fair. Your macrame plant hangers are sure to be a hit!
